scripts.copyfonts: copyfiles -f node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* dist/fonts && copyfiles -f fonts/* dist/fonts
scripts.usemin: usemin pages/budget.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/budget.html && usemin pages/chores.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/chores.html && usemin pages/grocery.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/grocery.html  && usemin pages/recipes.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/recipes.html  && usemin pages/index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
